name: [A] Slash Glowstone
flavor_text: Material used to evolve Swords, G. Swords, and Axes. Can be combined into S-rank stones at the Forge. Obtained from Ruins Exploration quests (Home>Quests>Daily).

name: [S] Slash Glowstone
flavor_text: Material used to evolve Swords, G. Swords, and Axes. Can be combined into SS-rank stones at the Forge. Obtained from Ruins Exploration quests (Home>Quests>Daily).

name: [SS] Slash Glowstone
flavor_text: Material used to evolve Swords, G. Swords, and Axes at the Forge. Obtained from Ruins Exploration quests (Home>Quests>Daily).

name: [SS] Slash Flashstone
flavor_text: Material used to evolve SS Swords, SS G. Swords, and SS Axes. Can be used in the Forge. Obtainable from events.

name: [A] Blunt Glowstone
flavor_text: Material used to evolve Clubs, M. Arts weapons, and Guns. Can be combined into S-rank stones at the Forge. Obtained from Ruins Exploration quests (Home>Quests>Daily).
